resources.string: Do you really want to quit Zap?

string.name: pin_entered_wrong_wait
string.comment: Parameters: %1$s: Number of seconds to wait

resources.string:
Do you really want to close the channel with:

%s

Do you really want to force close the channel with:

%1$s

Your funds will be locked up for %2$s.
How do you want to use ZAP?
Create a wallet on this phone.
You first have to setup a wallet.
To receive Bitcoin over the lightning network, you first have to open channels.

To receive Bitcoin over the lightning network, at least one of your channels needs some balance on your counterpartys side.

To achieve that, you have to spend something on lightning network first.

In the manage channels area you can always see how much you are able to send or receive over the lightning network right now.
All security warnings are enabled again.

If you copy this data to your clipboard, other apps (also malicious ones) are able to access and modify it.

To be sure nothing has changed while pasting, compare the beginning to:

%1$s

If you copy this data to your clipboard, other apps (also malicious ones) are able to access and modify it.

To be sure nothing has changed while pasting, compare the end to:

%1$s
Always double check the last 3 to 5 digits when pasting from clipboard. A malicious App might have changed the address in the background without you noticing it.
If not scrambled it is easy to guess your PIN just by watching your finger movements.

If you allow screen recording, malicious software might be able to record a video or take screenshots while you are using Zap. We recommend to deactivate this only while you want to record a video or take a screenshot.

string.name: guardian_highOnChainFee
string.comment: Parameters are: %1$s%%: % of transaction value. E.g: 13.2%

resources.string:
You are about to pay %1$s%% in network fees.

Possible solutions:
- try a lightning payment instead
- select lower fee, wait longer
- try again later
- transact a bigger amount

Do you want to continue anyway?

string.name: guardian_oldExchangeRate
string.comment: Parameters are: %1$s: Number of hours. E.g: 7.5

resources.string:
You requested an amount as fiat value, but your exchange rate data is old (retrieved %1$s hours ago).
Make sure you have an internet connection or consider requesting directly in Bitcoin.

Do you want to continue anyway?

Congratulations, you seem to have a nice stack of Bitcoin!\nPlease keep in mind that Zap is a Hot Wallet.\nWe do our best to keep this wallet secure, but for your own security sake, we recommend you consider Cold Wallets or Hardware Wallets to store your major savings.

You are on MAINNET with real Bitcoin!
Zap Android is in early development phase. You might lose funds!

If you don't want to take that risk, switch to testnet in the meantime.

Are you sure you want to connect to 

%1$s

Please check the hostname carefully.

By looking up information with a Block Explorer your IP-Address gets exposed. If you want to increase your anonymity, you should either not use it or go to the settings and choose a Block Explorer that supports Tor.
When activated, tap the Zap logo on the home screen to reveal your balance.
Zap will be restarted to make this change. Do you want to continue?
Tor Browser for Android is required.

string.name: error_blockExplorer_message
string.comment: Parameters are: %1$s: Name of selected block explorer, %2$s: 'mainnet' or 'testnet'

resources.string: "Your currently selected block explorer (%1$s) does not support %2$s. \nPlease go to settings and choose another block explorer to continue."
Invalid payment information.\n\nPlease use a Bitcoin address or Lightning payment request to initiate a payment.
You are connected to TESTNET. Please use TESTNET addresses or payment requests.
You are connected to MAINNET. Please use MAINNET addresses or payment requests.
To scan QR-Codes you have to allow Zap to use the camera.
Your clipboard does not contain any payment data.
Your clipboard does not contain any connection data.
Unable to read QR-Code, please try again.

Unsupported connection format.
Please use one of the following formats:

- Lndconnect string (lndconnect://...)
- BtcPay Server connection (config=...)
- Full content of your BTCPay Server config file
Could not fetch configuration from BTCPay Server.

Invalid lndconnect string.
Please make sure you used the following format:

lndconnect://<ip>:<port>?cert=<...>&macaroon=<...>
Your connection information does not contain a macaroon. This is mandatory.
The provided host or port is invalid.

Timeout.
The server is not responding.

- Please make sure you have a good internet connection

- Please make sure the server is running and still has the following IP:

%1$s

Unable to connect to LND.

- make sure the LND daemon is running on your server.

- make sure your port forwarding is active. (Port: %1$s)

- make sure your certificate is valid.

Tor connection failed.
 Please make sure that:

- Orbot is running

- Orbot is in VPN Mode

- Zap is in Orbot's list of activated apps.
JSON syntax of the BTCPay server configuration is invalid.
The BTCPay server configuration does not contain a BTC GRPC configuration.

Invalid format.
Please use one of the following:
- pubkey
- pubkey@host
- pubkey@host:port
The wallet needs to be setup to open a channel.
Could not establish connection to peer node.
Connection has been refused by peer.
Cannot connect to node without IP-address or host.
Could not connect to peer within deadline.
Number of pending channels exceed maximum.
Channel could not be opened within deadline.
Could not open channel with connected node: %s
Peers could not be fetched within deadline.
Peer is offline. Only force close allowed.
Channel could not be closed within deadline.
It looks like someone tried to deactivate your PIN. The App will close now.\nYou can reinstall the app and use the recovery process to regain access to your funds.
An empty name is not allowed.
Fee limit for payments above %1$d sats: %2$s
The fee for this payment (%1$.1f%%) exceeds the limit specified in the settings (%2$.0f%%).\n\nDo you really want to pay this invoice?
The fee for this payment (%1$d sats) will be higher than the payment amount (%2$d sats).\n\nDo you really want to pay this invoice?
In order to use this feature, you have to setup biometric authentication in your Android system settings.
The app has been reset as the last update included some structural changes.\nUnfortunately you will have to go through the setup process again.
You are trying to connect to a tor node. To use Zap with tor you have to install Orbot.\n\nDo you want to install Orbot now?
If Zap fails to find Orbot in the next step, make sure you have added and enabled the Guardian Project repository in F-Droid and try again.
You need an App Store to download Orbot. Please first download F-Droid.

QR-Codes containing the following are valid:

- Bitcoin Address
- Bitcoin Payment Request
- Lightning Payment Request

QR-Codes containing the following are valid:

- pubkey
- pubkey@host
- pubkey@host:port

QR-Codes containing the following are valid:

- Lndconnect string (lndconnect://...)
- BtcPay Server connection (config=...)
- Full content of your BTCPay Server config file

Lightning:

+ instant
+ low fees
- not always possible

Perfect for small transactions.
Use whenever possible.


On-Chain:

+ always possible
- slower
- higher fees

Good for big transactions.
Use this when Lightning is not possible.
Do you really want to delete this wallet?
